scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run css:build -- --watch" "chokidar \"src/**/*.html\" \"src/data.json\" -c \"npm run html:build\" "  "live-server --wait=500 ./public"
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run css:build" "npm run html:build"
scripts.prod: del-cli public/css/main.css public/**/*.html; cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run css:build" "npm run html:build"
